::: {#hero-heading}
<div class="h1">Hey, I'm happy you're here</div>

I work at the Université de Lorraine in France in topics related to the mechanical and innovation engineering. 

The objet of my research is the concept of [distributed recycling process](). 
The idea is to better understand the limits of this approach as a short/medium strategy of the plastic waste problem.
I am very interested to work with fantastic people to make a holistic analysis of this topic, by doing research from technical, logistical and systemic evaluation.   

Learn more about my research interests in [publications](/publication).


Get in touch by [sending me a note](/contact.qmd)! {{< fa feather-pointed >}}

:::
